extension_description.message: Salvar imagens de abas abertas. A ação padrão salva a maior imagem na guia ativa.

commands_execute_browser_action_descript.description: Description of the default Browser Action command
commands_execute_browser_action_descript.message: Executar Tab Image Saver com as configurações atuais.

browser_action_tooltip.description: Tooltip with extension name and currently selected ACTION

browser_action_menu_options.description: Menu label to open extension options

browser_action_menu_downloads.description: Menu label to open downloads folder

options_title.description: Page title for extension options with extension name

options_action_title.description: Title for the action option, which tabs to run the extension in

options_action_label_active.description: Option label for the action to run on the active tab

options_action_label_left.description: Option label for the action to run on tabs to the left of the active tab

options_action_label_right.description: Option label for the action to run on tabs to the right of the active tab

options_action_label_all.description: Option label for the action to run on all tabs

options_active_tab.description: Option label for the action to include the active tab (when action is Left or Right of the active tab)

options_conflict_action_title.description: Title for the filename conflict options
options_conflict_action_title.message: Ação de nome de arquivo duplicado

options_conflict_action_label_uniquify.description: Option label for filename conflict to rename

options_conflict_action_label_overwrite.description: Option label for filename conflict to overwrite

options_filter_title.description: Title of the image filtering options

options_filter_label_max.description: Option label for selecting only the largest image

options_filter_label_all.description: Option label for selecting all images

options_filter_label_direct.description: Option label for selecting tabs that are only images

options_filter_label_direct_note.description: Additional note for selecting tabs that are only images

options_dimensions_title.description: Title of the minimum image dimensions option

options_dimensions_width_label.description: Option label for minimum image width

options_dimensions_height_label.description: Option label for minimum image height

options_download_path_note.description: Additional note for download folder option
options_download_path_note.message: As imagens são salvas na pasta de download do seu navegador, você pode nomear uma subpasta para salvar.

options_path_rules_note.description: Additional note for path rules option
options_path_rules_note.message: Os caminhos serão anexados à sua subpasta de download. Deixe em branco para restaurar o padrão

options_close_tab.description: Option label to close tabs after downloading

options_notify_ended.description: Option label to show notification after downloading

options_remove_ended.description: Option label to remove downloads from history

options_download_private.description: Option label to download in Private Browsing mode

options_download_private_note.description: Additional note for download in Private Browsing mode option
options_download_private_note.message: (esconder do histórico, pode quebrar imagens que exigem login)

options_ignore_discarded_tab.description: Option label to ignore discarded tabs

notification_title_cancelled.description: Notification title when cancelled by user

notification_content_permission_error_ac.description: Notification message when extension could run in active tab

notification_content_permission_error_ta.description: Notification message when extension could not run in some tabs

notification_content_cancelled.description: Notification message when cancelled by user

notification_content_no_tabs.description: Notification message when the extension did not find any tabs to run in, listing the current extension action

notification_content_no_images.description: Notification message when no images were found on tabs

notification_content_images_saved.description: Notification message when some images were saved

notification_content_images_failed.description: Notification message when some images were not saved

notification_content_paths_failed.description: Notification message when some images did not have filenames
